name: Caramelized Onions
description: Classic caramelized onions couldn't be easier. Just slice some onions and add butter and time.
recipeIngredient: 3 pounds (1.4kg) yellow or mixed onions, sliced 1/8 inch thick (see note)
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: In a large stainless steel saucepan, or in 2 large stainless steel or cast iron skillets, melt butter over medium-high heat until foaming. Add onions and cook, stirring occasionally, until softened, about 8 minutes. Lower heat to medium-low and cook, stirring frequently, until onions are very sweet and a rich golden-brown color, 1 to 2 hours. If browned onion juices on bottom of pot threaten to burn, add 1 tablespoon (15ml) water, scrape up browned bits, and continue cooking; add water whenever needed to prevent burning. Season with salt and pepper.
